text: Charles Pile (born 5 April 1956) is a Barbadian former cyclist. He competed in the sprint and 1000m time trial events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Barbadian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Barbados Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Charles Pile
